game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a powerful artifact hidden deep within the lost city of Eldarath. The city is said to be cursed, but the reward is worth the risk.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a magical amulet granting resistance to poison

task.objective: Gather information about the lost city from local travelers and scholars
task.description: Speak with travelers and scholars in the nearby towns to gather information about Eldarath's location and potential dangers.

task.objective: Infiltrate the ruins of Eldarath and navigate its treacherous paths
task.description: Make your way through the jungle and enter the ancient city, avoiding deadly traps and creatures.

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the central temple
task.description: Face your greatest challenge yet as you navigate the treacherous central temple and claim the ancient artifact.
